name: g-chartframe
description: FT styled frames for D3 graphics

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -n gChartframe -o build/g-chartframe.js -- build/bundle.js

author: tom.g.pearson@gmail.com
